extendedInfo.description: The GPS Test app for Android is a utility that shows GPS information read from your phones internal GPS. Will support GLONASS phones. The app has several colour schemes, which could be used to match other instrumentation, used along side the app. It has a "night mode" colour scheme as well.If you like this app, please like GPS Test on Facebook: -http://www.facebook.com/gpstestGPS Test has five screens full of information: -1) GPS signal (SNR) bar chart, showing the signal strength for each satellite, as well as the accuracy and status of the GPS.2) Satellite positions in the sky (skyview), shown on a rotating compass.3) Your current location on the earth shown as text and on a world map. The current position of the sun and the day/night transition curve is also shown.4) Your current speed, heading and altitude shown as text.5) The current time read from the GPS and the local time in your current timezone, as well as the sunrise and sunset times at your location.Coordinate Grids supported by GPS Test:-OSGB, UTM, MGRS, USNG, CH1903, Maidenhead.Datums supported by GPS Test:-WGS84, NAD83, NAD27, ED50, AGD66, AGD84, SAD69If you like this app please look at ***GPS TEST PLUS***.Which has:-* Simple Navigation.* Location Sharing (email, sms, twitter etc)* Dials (Altimeter, Speedo and Compass)* 7 segment LED font* Dot Matrix font* HUD modeWorks on Honeycomb O/S and large screen tablets.GPS Test blog - http://gpstestapp.blogspot.com/INTERNET permissions are only required for analytics and app wall in the AppBrain library. The app will work fine without a WiFi or data conection.

reviews.title: Simple and cool
reviews.comment: Lots of useful info neatly placed and easy to use. Great work
reviews.author: Dimba Tim

reviews.title: simple but verry effective
reviews.comment: a very useful app producing very helpful information - the best app of its type?
reviews.author: P Carter

reviews.title: Propnut48
reviews.comment: This app is GREAT! It has ALL I need, speed, direction,altitude, sat. signal, time and more. Very easy to read and navigate through. A must, must, must have!
reviews.author: Richard Mankins

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: That\'s what I need. Brilliant for free. Better than the Windows phone OS Grid Ref. Bit like an old Garmin eTrex satellite layout, which is very useful to know how many satellites and where.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely great!
reviews.comment: Lovely clean display (especially the monochrome options) that shows all you need to see, simply and clearly. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Charles Butcher

reviews.title: Fantastic app!
reviews.comment: This is the best app of the same kind. Nice GUI, quick launch, and extremely powerful!  Could display the number of sat. as well as current speed, latitude & longitude, altitude, and UTC time and local time. All those information is directly coming from the GPS satellite!
reviews.author: Jianyi Xu

reviews.title: Works nicely
reviews.comment: Used it when I was having problems with my phone not being able to find my location. For some reason using wifi to help the gps was enabled on my phone, which just confused the gps.
reviews.author: Ragnar Brynj\303\272lfsson

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: This app has lots of useful information such as latitude and longitude and my favorite speedometer. All three information is clear and easy to understand
reviews.author: Christopher Simmons

reviews.title: Very handy GPS app
reviews.comment: Quick way to have status but also can present the data in a good manner while driving and mounted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I wish google maps integrated their software with yours to improve GPS locking, maybe you can set your app to activate in the background when google maps is on?
reviews.author: Mandouh Csintalan

reviews.title: Handy info all in 1 app
reviews.comment: Have used this for >1 year as a speedo checker and GPS diagnostic. Great layout and works well.
reviews.author: Robert Nicoll

reviews.title: JOSE C. PEREZ.  FIVE STARS.
reviews.comment: I LIKE THIS GPS LOCATOR. THANK YOU VERY MUCH. MORE POWER TO YOU. GOD BLESS YOU.
reviews.author: Jose Camilo Perez

reviews.title: Excellent tool
reviews.comment: Used this to clear my \"AGPS\", whatever that is, and it fixed the GPS on my Galaxy S2! Thanks! Also provides more data than I\'d ever need about exactly which satellites you\'re connected to, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this program
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app since my first droid a couple of years ago. Absolutely works. You can calibrate your speedometer in you car with this thing :-)
reviews.author: Mortimer Msnurd

reviews.title: Very decent app
reviews.comment: No real complaints, wish there was a way to indicate vertical accuracy, and see the raw NMEA stream. Otherwise, a great app- reminds me of having a standalone GPS receiver, back in the 90s.
reviews.author: Robert Moose

reviews.title: Works great - even with GLONASS
reviews.comment: Was looking for a GLONASS supported app. This one works perfect. You just have to remember GLONASS are triangles on the screen and are numbered from 65+. BTW- not too many devices support GLONASS but it is great. Lock on takes only seconds.
reviews.author: Brian Nicolich

reviews.title: Brill!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I need it to do! 6 figure eastings and northings are essential for me! Could only be bettered if it had a Google maps overlay option and the ability to save locations. But that\'s not really what this app is about. 5 stars from me!
reviews.author: Michael O\'Halloran

reviews.title: Simple and functional.
reviews.comment: Good for general plotting and getting coordinates for fire dept. and forest fire use. Some law enforcement and medical air evac uses as well. Thanks!
reviews.author: R Triplett

reviews.title: No fix
reviews.comment: After install it finds multiple satellites and obtains fix within seconds. Subsequent uses never gain fix unless app is uninstalled and reinstalled. Then cycle repeats. First use - immediate fix, subsequent use - no fix. I\'m tired of the uninstall / reinstall cycle. RazrMaxx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Says located in South America or in Pacific Ocean. I am in CA!! Sad GPS
reviews.author: Gordon Iwasaki
